 1990-07991990-04-260,  ,  VAC,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthority to make an ex gratia payment to Mr. Norbert Guay, a retired employee of the Department of Veterans Affairs, for a sum which is equivalent to the amount of interest which would have accrued on the severance benefits to which he was entitled upon his retirement.
